#summary Setting up InnoDB recovery tools

== Setup ==

Extract the archive file:
{{{
[root@test tmp]# tar xfz ~/download_path/innodb-recovery-0.3.tar.gz 
}}}

Then `configure`:
{{{
[root@test tmp]# cd innodb-recovery-0.3/mysql-source/
[root@test mysql-source]# ./configure
}}}

No `make` yet. The code needs to be compiled against structures generated by table definitions. Keep at:
{{{
[root@test mysql-source]# cd ..
[root@test innodb-recovery-0.3]# 
}}}

Next: [http://code.google.com/p/innodb-tools/wiki/RecoveryStepsTableSchema getting a hold on your table schema]
